name: Mediterranean Orzo Salad
description: Take a trip to the sun-kissed shores of the Mediterranean. Well, at least take your tastebuds there. Enjoy as a main course or a side dish for a backyard BBQ, and get bursts of bright dill and the satisfying crunch of fresh veggies with every bite. Cook orzo ahead of time so you can throw this salad together in just a few minutes!

ingredients.name: Coleslaw Dressing Mix or Lemon Dilly Dip Mix

preparation:
1. Cook orzo according to package directions. Drain. Stir in olive oil.  
  2. Meanwhile, chop cucumber, dice onion, and slice cherry tomatoes in half.  
  3. In a large bowl, whisk mayonnaise, yogurt, dressing mix, and vinegar. Add orzo and veggies to bowl; toss to combine.  
  4. Top with feta and olives.
tips: Make ahead and store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.
